mutants.code:
def find_min_unrepresentable_burles(n, k, a):
    k -= 1
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        if k > 0:
            x = pow(10, a[i + 1] - a[i]) - 1
            val = min(x, k)
            ans += pow(10, a[i]) * val
            k -= val
    ans += k * pow(10, a[n - 1])
    return ans

            val = min(x, k)
            ans += pow(10, a[i]) * val
            k -= val
    ans -= k * pow(10, a[n - 1])
    return ans

            ans += pow(10, a[i]) * val
            k -= val
    ans += k * pow(10, a[n - 1])
    return ans
